text:
:grapes: Trying to use the typescript action template...

```added 1080 packages from 506 contributors and audited 1085 packages in 130.486s```
:anguished:

elements.text: Trying to use the typescript action template...
added 1080 packages from 506 contributors and audited 1085 packages in 130.486s

text: I asked someone who actually knows typescript to setup the repo properly, since the template contains a few bad practices apparently which caused some issues/bugs for me, and now it's up to 12 config files but down to "only" 642 packages. for an action that does 1 api call, parses some json and writes a file to disk

elements.text: I asked someone who actually knows typescript to setup the repo properly, since the template contains a few bad practices apparently which caused some issues/bugs for me, and now it's up to 12 config files but down to "only" 642 packages. for an action that does 1 api call, parses some json and writes a file to disk

text: it baffles me how people can deal with this

elements.text: it baffles me how people can deal with this

text: makes one appreciate Julia's or Go's tooling tho :smile:
